XSLTProcessor.summary:
An XSLTProcessor applies an XSLT stylesheet transformation to an XML document to
produce a new XML document as output. It has methods to load the XSLT stylesheet, to
manipulate <xsl:param> parameter values, and to apply the
transformation to documents.

XSLTProcessorImportStylesheet.summary: The importStylesheet() method of the interface imports an XSLT stylesheet for the processor.

XSLTProcessorXSLTProcessor.summary: The XSLTProcessor() constructor creates a new object instance.

XSLTProcessorTransformToFragment.summary: The transformToFragment() method of the interface transforms a provided source to a using the XSLT stylesheet associated with the XSLTProcessor.

XSLTProcessorRemoveParameter.summary: The removeParameter() method of the interface removes the parameter (<xsl:param>) and its value from the stylesheet imported in the processor.

XSLTProcessorClearParameters.summary: The clearParameters() method of the interface removes all parameters (<xsl:param>) and their values from the stylesheet imported in the processor. The XSLTProcessor will then use the default values specified in the XSLT stylesheet.

XSLTProcessorSetParameter.summary: The setParameter() method of the interface sets the value of a parameter (<xsl:param>) in the stylesheet imported in the processor.

XSLTProcessorTransformToDocument.summary: The transformToDocument() method of the interface transforms the provided source to a using the XSLT stylesheet associated with XSLTProcessor.
XSLTProcessorTransformToDocument.returns:
A . The actual interface depends on the output method of the stylesheet, as specified by <xsl:output> element's method.
Output methodResult interface
html
xml
text with a single root element <transformiix:result> with the text as a child

XSLTProcessorReset.summary: The reset() method of the interface removes all parameters (<xsl:param>) and the XSLT stylesheet from the processor. The XSLTProcessor will then be in its original state when it was created.

XSLTProcessorGetParameter.summary: The getParameter() method of the interface returns the value of a parameter (<xsl:param>) from the stylesheet imported in the processor.
XSLTProcessorGetParameter.returns:
An object that is the value associated with the parameter. It can be of any type.
NOTEFirefox supports any kind of parameter. Chrome, Edge and Safari only support string parameters.
